vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
στρηνιάω,
run riot, wax wanton, [NT+4th c.BC+];= gerrio, gestio, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to be wanton, live in luxury, with an implication that this luxury contributes to improper sensuality and immorality; to revel, riot, Rev. 18:7, 9*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: deleitarse, vivir en sensualidad, deleites o lujos
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 奢侈, 縱情的生活著 (啟 18:7,9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 奢侈, 纵情的生活着 (启 18:7,9)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sống xa hoa bao nhiêu, sống trong xa xỉ bao nhiêu
